description: Top 10 cyber-safety tips 1. Think before you click. 2. Get anti-virus protection and keep it updated.
title: Here’s top 10 cyber-safety tips
maintext:
Top 10 cyber-safety tips
1. Think before you click.
2. Get anti-virus protection and keep it updated.
3. Keep your computer software and apps updated.
4. Back-up your pictures and documents.
5. Create strong, unique passwords for every site.
6. Be careful on public Wi-Fi connections.
7. Question what you see in emails and pop-ups.
8. Download and stream from proper sites only.
9. Do not post sensitive information on social media sites.
10. Be mindful of email and phone call fraud attempts.
•••
The Garden Island
